actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to terminate the Economic Development Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: EDA Elimination Act of 2011 - Terminates the Economic Development Administration (EDA). Repeals the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965. Direct the Secretary of Commerce to take such actions as necessary to conclude the outstanding affairs of the EDA, including dispositions of personnel, assets, and obligations.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the Economic Development Administration, and for other purposes.
